title: buds by Shangri-La: Interactive Play Space for Kids
blurb: An interactive play space by Shangri-La for children.
description: buds by Shangri-La is an interactive play space designed for children of all ages. It features a variety of play zones, including a climbing structure, a ball pit, and an art studio. buds also offers a variety of activities and programs for children, such as storytelling, arts and crafts, and cooking classes. buds by Shangri-La is the perfect place for families to spend quality time together. The facility includes themed play areas designed to spark creativity and imagination, along with curated activity programs to engage children in active learning and play. buds provides a safe and stimulating environment where kids can explore, learn, and have fun.

title: buds by Shangri-La Garden Wing Activities
blurb: Explore the Garden Wing Deluxe experience.

The Garden Wing is perfect for families seeking a tranquil retreat with easy access to the hotel's various facilities and attractions.

title: Shangri-La Singapore Restaurants and Bars
blurb: Explore diverse dining options at Shangri-La Singapore.
description: Shangri-La Singapore offers a variety of dining experiences, including restaurants, bars, and lounges. Origin Bar provides a sophisticated setting for cocktails, while The Lobby Lounge offers a relaxed atmosphere for afternoon tea. The Rose Veranda is known for its elegant ambiance and international cuisine. Shophouse by Shangri-La offers a taste of local flavors. These venues cater to different tastes and preferences, providing a range of culinary experiences for guests and visitors alike. Perfect for families and individuals looking for quality dining options in a luxurious setting. Enjoy a memorable meal in one of our exquisite venues, each offering a unique culinary journey.
